document_data.name: Myldryd Urchinspine
document_data.mainbody: '''Myldryd Urchinspine''' was a [[sea hag]] that dwelled within a wrecked ship on the shore of the [[Snout of Omgar]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: The wretched hag made her lair within the ruined hull of the ''[[Dirty Dastard]]'', that ran ashore on the [[Chult]]an isle.
document_data.Possessions: Hidden in the sand beneath the wrecked ship was a treasure chest that held all of Myldryd's possessions. Among these were several simple trinkets, a comb made of [[whale]] bone, a stuffed [[parrot]] that housed a single [[carnelian]], and hidden within a secret compartment, a ''[[medallion of thoughts]]''.
document_data.Relationships: She commanded a pair of [[giant crab]] minions.
